org.spongepowered.api.event.block

Interface BlockHarvestEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, Cancellable, CauseTracked, Event, GameEvent, ItemDropEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityHarvestBlockEvent, HumanHarvestBlockEvent, LivingHarvestBlockEvent, PlayerHarvestBlockEvent

    public interface BlockHarvestEvent
extends BlockEvent, ItemDropEvent, Cancellable
    Dispatched when a Location is about to drop it's items.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the chance the items are being dropped.
      void setDropChance(float chance)
      Sets the chance the items will be dropped.

      Sets the items that are to be dropped.

    • Method Detail

      • setDroppedItems

        void setDroppedItems(Collection<Item> items)
        Sets the items that are to be dropped.
        Parameters:
        items - The collection of item entities to drop

      • getDropChance

        float getDropChance()
        Gets the chance the items are being dropped. A chance of 1 means all the items are dropped.
        Returns:
        The chance, between 0 and 1

      • setDropChance

        void setDropChance(float chance)
        Sets the chance the items will be dropped.

        Setting the chance to 0 may stop the items from dropping, to guarantee no items are dropped, use Cancellable.setCancelled(boolean).

        Parameters:
        chance - The chance, must be between 0 and 1
